info.name: Django Drive API endpoints
info.description: This collection includes requests for Drive API endpoints for three main tasks - list files, upload files, and download files.

request.description: This request includes access token in header and the API endpoint receves a list of files in JSON format including file id. Acess Token is generated in the Authorisation tab.

Method POST, Include a key - file and upload a file.

A valid response includes name, id, and type of file uploaded.
The file id received in list of files is updated in the query parameter and a GET request returns the file if available.
